website_summaries.verdict: Heats up quickly and is perfect for all of your styling needs.
pros: Comes in a fun, bright pink color
1" wand makes it easy to manage
Temperature dial so you can find the perfect temperature for each hair style
cons: Hair can snag if not careful

website_summaries.verdict: A convenient and compact travel-ready 1-inch flat iron. Simple to use with effective salon-quality results.
pros: Notable for the on and off switch, which features a temperature wheel to select your desired temperature setting
Users rave about the exceptional results they get using this travel flat iron
cons: Doesn't let you know when the selected heat has been reached

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap you guys
customer_reviews.text: I had the same straightening iron (Helen of Troy) for years and it never really seemed to give me the results I liked. I finally got a nice job and able to purchase a top notch straightener and I have gotten so many compliments in the few weeks I've had it! My hair looks and feels so silky, doesn't kink, and it even tackles the wavy fibers up under my neck. My hair is naturally curly/wavy and I have dreamed to have hair this good since I was itty bitty. It took me about 20 years but I finally have the look i've always wanted!!! Thanks CHI!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Spera

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a travel size/ blades don’t close well.
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised online as great for travel with dual power 110/220 adapter. 1. It’s a regular size, not a travel size. 2. It only works with 110. 3. The blades are EXTREMELY difficult to close, so the hair slips through, and requires multiple passes over the same piece of hair. That means much more hair damage from heat, and it hurt my hands having to press the blades so hard! 4. The temperature control disc is tiny and it requires glasses to see the numbers on it. I have a flat iron by PING. It’s the best! It’s the same size as this one and the blades close easily. I’ll stick with it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: A.L.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot live without this flat iron
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt the very best flat iron I have ever owned. My hair is very thick with a slight curl and a mind of its own. And tends to go frizzy no matter what hair products I use. The CHI Expert Classic Tourmaline Ceramic Flat Iron (in hot pink) straightens my hair perfectly with very little effort or time spent. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ellyn

customer_reviews.title: Not made like original Chi
customer_reviews.text: The outside of this Chi is really hot, not like the original.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Great for thicker hair. I love my Chi!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Chi ! My older one quit working so I bought a cheaper one. I had to go back to Chi! It's well worth the money. Those cheaper ones are a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Loved the color
customer_reviews.text: Didnt last as long as my other CHI straighteners.. not sure why. Loved the color!
customer_reviews.author: Chhhhhherylyn

customer_reviews.title: Fried My Hair
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: I did love the product, until I saw what it was doing to my hair. My ends are totally fried, I have to get a haircut like, yesterday. I loved the way it worked, it's just way too hard on my hair, and turning the heat down means it doesnt get straight...a little bummed out, but I'll find a good one eventually I love this product! I was a little hesitant, not sure what to expect bc of the couple bad reviews. But mine is awesome! It was just delivered and I tried it immediately. It's better than my other chi and works wonderfully!! :)
customer_reviews.author: jessica fezer

customer_reviews.title: buy it!
customer_reviews.text: this is the best straightener that I have bought in a long time. It does not rip your hair when you use it, you can tell how hot it is, heats up fast, and isn't to big or to small.
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic, so it doesn’t damage your hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST flat iron I’ve ever had. My old one (15 years) finally gave out. I read some of the reviews that said it pulls their hair. NO WAY! It’s smooth, comfortable, well worth the money. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dial heat control
customer_reviews.text: This Chi has a dial temperature control so you can choose the amount of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Doodle62

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Doesn’t pull your hair and easy to regulate. I didn’t need to buy the more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with my Chi Air flat iron.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the Chi Air at all. I have used the original Chi for years, until it broke. The ceramic flat iron is too slick and I can’t get it to grip my hair at all. I have been unable to get the curl and frizz out of my hair. I’m very unhappy with this Chi, but I waited too long to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flat iron
customer_reviews.text: Great flat iron. My hair stylist used it to straighten my hair and I immediately feel in love with how straight it made my coarse hair. And I don't have to get a relaxer done to my hair anymore because i get the same hair results from straightening my hair with this straightener:) I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this as a gift and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great present for my gf
customer_reviews.text: She loves her flat iron gets hot fast great gift for my gf.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this thing
customer_reviews.text: So I don't exactly know much about flat irons but my wife says that this is one of the best because it doesn't get her split ends. She had her first one for years and finally died so I got this one for her as again and she was very excited.
customer_reviews.author: buckeyede06

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! I have fine curly hair that tends ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I have fine curly hair that tends to be dry. It made my hair smooth snd silky and gives me the look I want. Love the pink! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get hot enough for my hair
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get the ends of my hair as straight as I would have like it to be ill give it a 3 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: tyhesha

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it. The heat goes up as high as 410 degrees. The cord is super long. My daughter has had the same one for years and still works like day one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural hair with a relaxed look
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair, but I miss having a straight relaxed look. Really I don't see why I can't have both. Well with this flat iron I finally can. My hair gets pleasantly straight and still has body and movement. I am glad I invested in this flat iron because my cheepo one really wasn't up to snuff. My results before never got really straight or lasted more than 10 m. Those days are finally over.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife over 3 years ago and she still uses it today.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy adkins

customer_reviews.title: Is great
customer_reviews.text: Is great for those with thin hair. And doesn't leave your hair smelling like burn.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Is safe and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it leaves my hair nice and silky.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It glides through my hair when I use it, and I really like the temperature control. It works even better than my last Chi.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: 1 YEAR AND STILL GOING!
customer_reviews.text: got this as a gift and i love it had it for 1 year now and it never failed me
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Adalardi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good, but i wish it got a little hotter than 410 degrees (that's the max).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product less than two months and it no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work. Maybe I got a dud, but I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good at first
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an original chi that I had that stopped turning on. I went with this because it was a little less expensive and got okay reviews. At first it was great and got really hot, and I only had to run over each part of my hair once for it to be straight (my hair is wavy/kinky). However, after having it for about two months, it does not get nearly as hot, and I have to go over my hair multiple times for it to be straight. I wish I had just spent the more money knowing I wouldn't have any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE, GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO EVERYONE. MY SISTER ACTUALLY BOUGHT THIS PRODUCT FROM TARGET OVER A YEAR AGO FOR 96 DOLLARS. I WOULD ALWAYS BORROW THIS FLAT IRON, I LOVED HOW FAST IT HEATED UP AND HOW STRAIGHT AND BOUNCY IT LEFT MY HAIR. MY AUNT ALSO LOVED HOW THIS STRAIGHTEN HER HAIR SO SHE BOUGHT ONE FROM TARGET FOR 99 DOLLARS. I FOUND THIS ON AMAZON FOR 70, BRAND NEW, CANT GET NO BETTER THAN THAT. SHIPPING WAS FAST. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Rece

customer_reviews.title: Works like a CHi!
customer_reviews.text: The CHI Air is great, works awesome (as expected). Total "recommend" to all women who love CHI or straight hair or both.
customer_reviews.author: Dimple

customer_reviews.title: Good Straightener
customer_reviews.text: It straightens my hair a lot better then my cheap walmart conair straightener. I have crazy curly, textured hair and it makes me look like I was born with straight hair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on fine hair
customer_reviews.text: My old Instyler broke and my daughter recommended this CHI. She has one and loves it. Her hair is shorter and not as fine as mine. I tried it several times with her help and got nothing but frizz on the ends. I've concluded it isn't good with fine/thin hair and have bought a duplicate of my old one.
customer_reviews.author: bookreader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this iron! Works amazing, small and weightless.
customer_reviews.author: Maria ❤️

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star
customer_reviews.text: I love my Chi Air. It's great for my coarse texture hair. I can use it on the lowest setting and my hair turns out great with less heat damage.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Farr

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but not the best
customer_reviews.text: The CHI Air Expert Classic Tourmaline Ceramic Iron may look cute in pink, but it doesn't get as hot as traditional CHI flat irons. It has a dial where you can adjust the heat, I keep mine at max, 410 degress, all the time. The dial is in a spot where you can easily change the temperature while styling, which is annoying when you're trying to do your hai and the iron keeps cooling down.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Wooters

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I don't have any issues with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I don't have any issues with the placement of the temperature button. I see how some people can, but as long as you're careful you'll be okay. I can't say enough good things about my Chi flat iron. :)
customer_reviews.author: violetlight

customer_reviews.title: Best Working Flat Iron
customer_reviews.text: My favorite flat iron. Lasts much longer than the cheap flat irons and works so quickly!!! It used to take me a while to straighten my hair everyday and now it takes less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It heats up quickly and works wonderful. The cord wraps easily also for storage. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RSRodgers

customer_reviews.title: worked for 10 months
customer_reviews.text: It works great until just the other day where it stopped working. I have to mess with the cord in order for it to work. I contacted CHI and the WARRANTY IS VOIDED BECAUSE it was bought off amazon. Amazon did refund me part of my money (I believed I paid like $80 for this and only got back $59) then charged me a restocking fee. I will be contacting them again about this!
customer_reviews.author: J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fake Chi!!
customer_reviews.text: Not a real Chi!! It was pulling my hair the second time I us d it!! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Storey

customer_reviews.title: CHI Air Pro Expert Classic Tourmaline Ceramic Hair Straightener
customer_reviews.text: I bought this CHI Air Pro Expert Classic Tourmaline Ceramic Hair Straightener for my daughter as a birthday gift. She Loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Diane Varecka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I do like it! Provides wonderful curls. Recommend you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Arainia

customer_reviews.title: dissatisfied with delivery, but loving the product. <3
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the straightener, it works wonders on my hair. I having african-american type hair, it's often difficult to find a straightener that'll do the job. The Chi is perfect.Though i admire the product, I was enraged when I recieved it because I ordered the Pure Pink CHi and I received the silver one. :/ so check before you buy.other than that all is good. (:
customer_reviews.author: bubblybri<3

customer_reviews.title: Not recommending
customer_reviews.text: does not get hot enough or straighten as well as the one I have. My daughter only liked for the color, should of researched more
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: love this straight we. I have curly hair (Indian hair) and it straightens very easily. I recommend blow drying your hair straight before using this tool to make it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice beautiful pink color, works fantastic. I hope it lasts along long time. I would recommend it this flat iron.
customer_reviews.author: bling

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning... temperature does not get ...
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning...temperature does not get hot enough to work, barely on the higher setting
customer_reviews.author: Roya

customer_reviews.title: Did not like it
customer_reviews.text: Temperature gauge on the side is too hard to see as it is tiny, plus it moves too easily and you might end up with burnt hair. I returned it and bought the crazy color CHI with the digital readout. It is better and temp stays put.
customer_reviews.author: PigtailGoddess

customer_reviews.title: You MIGHT be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I asked for a Pure Pink CHI but I received a Fire Red instead. It didn't bother me that much because its an authentic CHI. So if you want a specific color watch because you might be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: They sent me this item and it did not hear ...
customer_reviews.text: They sent me this item and it did not hear up properly. Never purchasing again my chi does not work
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Sleek body and effective heat plates! A must have for YOUR hair type!
customer_reviews.text: Still using this product to this day and it is sturdy and gets the job done amazingly. I am a stickler for straighteners especially since my hair frizzes so easily, but using this straightener along with the other hair products that CHI offers is a must! I also love that you can customize the color of the straightener too! They come in so many different patterns! The heat plates work very fast, so it's convenient if you're in a rush!If you're looking for a straightener to offer as a gift or for your own personal use for any kind of hair type, this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Elana Sison

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love my chi!!!! I don't think I can go back to another strainer! its hot without burning my hair, and never snags. only thing that could be improved is an auto shut off in case you leave it on.
customer_reviews.author: Katface

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this Chi, worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic flat iron...of course. I have long straight blonde hair and I use this iron to flatten frizz and add curl. Yes, the on/off switch is on the side as is the heat wheel and you can hit it with your hand if you're not careful, but it's really not a big problem. This iron styles my hair crazy fast, much faster than any other irons I've used. Completely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed that an expensive Chi doesn't get very hot and doesn't really work on my thin hair. Would have sent it back but got rid of the box too soon.
customer_reviews.author: Cmt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Color
customer_reviews.text: This is my first chi. I love the feminine color. I have wavy hair but this smooths it out nicely. The only negative thing is the placement of the temperature control. It is on the side and Its easy to accidentally switch to the hottest setting during use.
customer_reviews.author: sasdel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement for a similar flat iron that was about 6 years old. I was hesitant that it would not work as well, but it far exceeded my expectations. The temperature control works well, the iron is easy to hold. I’d definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: A.Spring

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product. This is my 3rd Chi and I ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product. This is my 3rd Chi and I like this company. I just wish I could make my hair as straight as my hair dresser does. even with this product I cannot achieve that bone-straight look.
customer_reviews.author: Texas RN Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair straightener!!!! So worth it and cools off fast after! I was in love with my older one and had it for 10 years but it was time for a new one. I found this online and hoped for the best and boy am I glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Bought this one to replace a previous Chi Air after years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Filippi

customer_reviews.title: chi flat irons are the best
customer_reviews.text: I own the original version and purchased this one for my daughters 13th birthday. She loves it and it also has a temperature control whereas my version does not.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great Flat Iron!
customer_reviews.text: This flat iron is perfect for curling or straightening hair! I bought a patterned Chi and returned it due to heat problems for this one. Couldn't be happier! The settings are a great range and I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Erin L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels a little on the cheap side- not as sturdy as other Chi brand flat irons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is to replace one I have had for years.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my girlfriend as a gift. She is in love with it..
customer_reviews.author: Nito87

customer_reviews.title: A Good FAKE- No GFCI plug w/reset Crackles when plugged in ...
customer_reviews.text: A Good FAKE- No GFCI plug w/reset Crackles when plugged in Logo wiped off in 2 days Squeaks while using Authentic CHI's have a GFCI W/reset, ( if it doesn't it may cause a fire)unremovable logo, Extremely Disappointed since this was my first CHI. You can only purchase true CHI's from Ulta and salons.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie

customer_reviews.title: Great brand and usually lasts long enough to get your ...
customer_reviews.text: Great brand and usually lasts long enough to get your monies worth. This one has a 2 year warranty, I ordered it in the morning and got it the same night when my old one finally died so I couldn't be happier that I didn't even have to go a day without one or to any stores!
customer_reviews.author: tjam

customer_reviews.title: I didnt work better them my target straighter
customer_reviews.text: I returned this. I didnt work better them my target straighter. In fact my old one was better. Not worth the 100 buck bucks
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lewis

product_meta.title: CHI Expert Classic Tourmaline Ceramic Flat Iron
product_meta.description:
CHI Air 1 Ceramic Flat Iron in Pure Pink - Ionic Tourmaline Hair Straightener utilizes the latest innovative technology combining Tourmaline Ceramic with even heat distribution, producing an exceptionally high amount of negative ions and Far Infrared which reduce static electricity for that perfect style. Hair is left smooth and silky with an unparalleled shine. This Classic Flat Iron is ideal for all your hairstyle needs. Now, you can straighten, smooth, curl, wave, spiral, flip, and bend. Just use your imagination and create your own personal flair. Heating Time- one minute Eliminates Static Reduces Frizz Unparalleled Shine Quick Heat Up 9 Foot Swivel Cord for Convenience 2 Year Limited Warranty Floating Plates Temperature Dial for Variable Heat Settings 180F-410F Dual Voltage

BRAND STORY
CHI haircare and tools are manufactured by Farouk Systems a Houston based company.
feature_bullets: The CHI Flat Iron produces an exceptionally high amount of negative ions, and Far Infrared, which reduces static electricity for that perfect style
Features a temperature dial for variable heat settings, floating plates for professional results, quick heat up, and a 9' swivel cord
Ideal for all hair styling, including straightening, smoothing, curling, waving, spiraling, flipping and bending.
9 ft. swivel cord just like the pros

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
